props.name: mediaAlign
props.description: Allows you to align your text {right, left, center}

props.name: imgClass
props.description: Custom class added to the image/icon

props.name: imgRatio
props.description: Aspect ratio of the media container. {square, 1-2, 2-3, 3-4, 9-16, 2-1, 3-2, 4-3, 16-9} See cdr-img

props.name: imgCover
props.description: Requires `imgRatio`. Scale the image to be as large as possible to fill the area (background-position: cover;) See cdr-img

props.name: imgCrop
props.description: Requires `imgRatio`. Area to crop the image overflow to. {top, y-center, bottom} {left, x-center, right} See cdr-img

props.name: imgAlt
props.description: Image alternitive description, defaults to blank. See cdr-img

props.name: imgHrefText
props.description: Screen reader text for the linked image

slots.name: default
slots.description: innerHTML inside of the media object component
